channel.title: Technology News Today, Latest Tech News | The Hindu
channel.description: Tech News Today: Get today’s technology news updates on latest smartphones, laptop, specifications, reviews, video games and much more from The Hindu’s Science and Tech

item.title: Wikipedia is not going anywhere, says founder Jimmy Wales as online encyclopaedia completes 25 years

item.title: EU opens probe into Musk’s Grok over sexual AI deepfakes

item.title: Pax Silica | The silicon curtain
item.description: By formalising a coalition that includes Australia’s mines to Singapore’s logistics and Japan’s precision machinery, the U.S. is attempting to build a ‘closed-loop’ ecosystem

item.title: Netflix CEOs on back foot in defence of $83 billion Warner Bros bid
item.description: With the expensive deal hanging over its head, Netflix delivered a tepid revenue beat for what is usually one of its strongest quarters, and forecast equally dull prospects for the new year

item.description: On January 21, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent urged Europeans to avoid “reflexive anger” and sit down with Donald Trump in Davos to hear his arguments about acquiring Greenland.

item.title: Surging billionaire wealth a political threat, Oxfam warns as Davos opens
item.description: US President Donald Trump's policies in particular spurred the fortunes of the ultra-rich, which jumped 16.2 percent in the first year of his second term to $18.3 trillion, the NGO said

item.title: EU plans phase out of high risk telecom suppliers, in proposals seen as targeting China
item.description: The European Union plans to phase out telecom gear from companies in "high risk" countries, targeting Chinese firms like Huawei and ZTE

item.title: Why SIR verification needs to be completely digitised
item.description: SIR 2.0, aimed at updating electoral rolls, has caused confusion and distress among voters. Despite the ECINet’s ability to handle data entry, verification, cross-checks, and audit trails, the process has relied heavily on paper-based forms, summons, and hearings

item.title: ASICS GEL-Nimbus 28 Review: A comfortable running shoe built for long runs, recovery days, and easy miles
item.description: After three weeks of regular use, the Nimbus 28 stands out as one of the most comfortable running shoes ASICS currently offers for long-distance running and daily training

item.title: The ‘chroma key’ to great filmmaking: How green screen technology works
item.description: Have you ever watched a film with some special add-ons and wondered, ‘How do they do that?’. Well, the answer lies in a screen of a very specific colour. Let’s explore the magic of chroma keying. Lights, camera, action!

item.description: Google’s Project Suncatcher is experimenting with a novel approach: putting datacentres servicing AI workloads in low-earth orbit and letting them feed on solar energy; ISRO is also reportedly studying space-based datacentre technology
